meta.metaTitle: Free Redirect Service - Fast & Reliable URL Redirects
meta.metaDescription: Get started with our free redirect service. Create unlimited URL redirects, track clicks, and manage your links effortlessly. No credit card required.

hero.headline: Free Redirect Service for Everyone
hero.subheadline: Start redirecting URLs instantly with our free plan. Perfect for individuals and small projects. No setup fees, no hidden costs.

children.text: Why Choose Our Free Redirect Service?
Our free redirect service offers everything you need to manage URL redirects effectively. Whether you're redirecting a single URL or managing multiple domains, our platform makes it simple and fast.
Unlimited redirects on the free plan

faqs.question: Is the free redirect service really free?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our free plan includes unlimited redirects with basic analytics. No credit card required to get started.

faqs.question: What types of redirects are supported?
faqs.answer: We support 301 (permanent), 302 (temporary), and 307 (temporary) redirects. All redirect types are available on the free plan.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade later if I need more features?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to our premium plans anytime to unlock advanced features like custom domains, branded links, and priority support.

faqs.question: How long do the free redirects last?
faqs.answer: Forever! Once you create a redirect on our free plan, it will continue working indefinitely as long as your account remains active.

faqs.question: Is there a limit on redirect clicks?
faqs.answer: No click limits on the free plan. Your redirects will work regardless of how many times they're accessed.
